Title: Object: Out of Egypt have I call'd my Son
Description: The return from Egypt, after Rubens; the Holy Family walking to right, with the Virgin leading Christ by the hand and St Joseph leading a donkey while gesturing to right; a river in the background to right; reworked state republished by Laurie & Whittle in 1794. Mezzotint with etching
Curator's comments: This is from the third recorded state; see 2010,7081.668 for more information.
Bibliographic references: Schneevoogt 1873 / Catalogue des estampes gravées d'après P.P.Rubens (26.127)
Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (undescribed)
Russell 1926 / English Mezzotint Portraits and their states: Catalogue of Corrections of and Additions to Chaloner Smith's "British Mezzotinto Portraits" (undescribed)
Subjects: return of the holy family from egypt
